member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character
member.summary: Represents a single character in the player's party with class, race, and stats.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the character's name.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.Class
member.summary: Gets or sets the character's class.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.Race
member.summary: Gets or sets the character's race.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.Stats
member.summary: Gets or sets the character's stats.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.Level
member.summary: Gets or sets the character's level.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.Experience
member.summary: Gets or sets the character's experience points.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.#ctor(System.String,OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass,OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Constructor with basic character information.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.GetHitPoints
member.summary: Get the character's hit points based on class and constitution.
member.returns: The character's total hit points.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.GetMagicPoints
member.summary: Get the character's magic points based on class and intelligence/wisdom.
member.returns: The character's total magic points.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.ToDictionary
member.summary: Convert character to Godot dictionary for serialization.
member.returns: A dictionary containing the character's data.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character.FromDictionary(Godot.Collections.Dictionary{System.String,Godot.Variant})
member.summary: Create character from Godot dictionary.
member.returns: A new character instance created from the dictionary data.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats
member.summary: Character statistics following classic CRPG attribute system.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.Strength
member.summary: Gets or sets the strength stat, which affects melee combat and physical tasks.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.Intelligence
member.summary: Gets or sets the intelligence stat, which affects spellcasting and knowledge skills.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.Wisdom
member.summary: Gets or sets the wisdom stat, which affects divine spellcasting and perception.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.Dexterity
member.summary: Gets or sets the dexterity stat, which affects ranged combat and agility.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.Constitution
member.summary: Gets or sets the constitution stat, which affects hit points and endurance.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.Charisma
member.summary: Gets or sets the charisma stat, which affects social interactions and leadership.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.Luck
member.summary: Gets or sets the luck stat, which affects random events and critical hits.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor with zero values.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Constructor with specific stat values.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.GenerateRandomStats
member.summary: Generate random stats using classic dice rolling method (3d6 for each stat).
member.returns: A new CharacterStats instance with randomly generated values.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.ApplyRacialModifiers(OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace)
member.summary: Apply racial modifiers to base stats.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.GetModifier(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the modifier for a given stat (used in calculations).
member.param: The stat to get modifier for.
member.returns: Modifier value (-5 to +5 typically).

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.Roll3d6(System.Random)
member.summary: Roll 3 six-sided dice for stat generation.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.ToDictionary
member.summary: Convert stats to Godot dictionary for serialization.
member.returns: A dictionary containing all stat values.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterStats.FromDictionary(Godot.Collections.Dictionary{System.String,Godot.Variant})
member.summary: Load stats from Godot dictionary.
member.returns: A new CharacterStats instance created from the dictionary data.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatSceneData
member.summary: Data model for turn-based pixel combat scenes.

member.summary: Gets or sets the scene type identifier.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatSceneData.PlayerSprite
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the player sprite texture.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatSceneData.Enemy
member.summary: Gets or sets the enemy data for this combat encounter.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatSceneData.Actions
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of available combat actions.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatSceneData.Music
member.summary: Gets or sets the background music for the combat scene.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatSceneData.VictoryText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed when the player wins.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatEnemy
member.summary: Represents an enemy in combat with stats and behavior.

member.summary: Gets or sets the enemy's name.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatEnemy.HP
member.summary: Gets or sets the enemy's current hit points.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatEnemy.MaxHP
member.summary: Gets or sets the enemy's maximum hit points.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatEnemy.Attack
member.summary: Gets or sets the enemy's attack power.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatEnemy.Defense
member.summary: Gets or sets the enemy's defense value.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatEnemy.Sprite
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the enemy sprite texture.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatEnemy.AttackPatterns
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of attack patterns this enemy can use.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatAction
member.summary: Represents a combat action (FIGHT, MAGIC, ITEM, RUN).

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatAction.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the combat action.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatAction.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the combat action.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatAction.Power
member.summary: Gets or sets the power level of the combat action.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CombatAction.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the combat action.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverPersona
member.summary: Represents an individual Dreamweaver persona that can generate dynamic narrative using the nobodywho LLM framework. Each persona uses JSON text as a foundation for creating personalized dialogue and choices.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverPersona.PersonaId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for this persona.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverPersona.IsActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this persona is currently active.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverPersona.Name
member.summary: Gets the display name of this persona.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverPersona.Archetype
member.summary: Gets the archetype or personality type of this persona.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverPersona.GenerateNarrativeAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Generates dynamic narrative text using the JSON foundation as prompts.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverPersona.GetOpeningLineAsync
member.summary: Gets a dynamic opening line, potentially enhanced by LLM.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverPersona.GenerateChoicesAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Generates dynamic choices based on current game state and persona.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverSystem
member.summary: Main orchestrator for the Dreamweaver LLM system. Manages three personas (Hero, Shadow, Ambition) and coordinates dynamic narrative generation using the nobodywho framework.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverSystem.GenerateNarrativeAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates dynamic narrative for a specific persona using LLM. Uses the JSON text as a foundation for the prompt.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverSystem.GetOpeningLineAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a random opening line for a persona, enhanced by LLM if available.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverSystem.GenerateChoicesAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates dynamic choices for a persona based on current game state.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverSystem.ActivatePersona(System.String)
member.summary: Activates a persona, making it the primary narrative voice.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverSystem.GetActivePersona
member.summary: Gets the currently active persona.
member.returns: The currently active persona, or null if none is active.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverType
member.summary: Core alignment mechanic that influences narrative and gameplay throughout the game.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverType.Light
member.summary: Hero thread - represents sacrifice, wisdom, and positive transformation.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverType.Mischief
member.summary: Ambition thread - represents chaos, transformation, and unpredictable change.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverType.Wrath
member.summary: Shadow thread - represents power, consequence, and darker impulses.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverThread
member.summary: Player's chosen narrative alignment thread that determines story variations.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverThread.Hero
member.summary: Light-aligned choices focusing on heroism and positive outcomes.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverThread.Shadow
member.summary: Wrath-aligned choices focusing on power and darker consequences.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.DreamweaverThread.Ambition
member.summary: Mischief-aligned choices focusing on chaos and transformation.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass
member.summary: Classic CRPG character classes for party creation.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass.Fighter
member.summary: Warrior class specializing in combat and physical strength.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass.Mage
member.summary: Magic-user class specializing in spellcasting and arcane knowledge.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass.Priest
member.summary: Divine spellcaster class focusing on healing and support magic.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass.Thief
member.summary: Rogue class specializing in stealth, traps, and opportunistic combat.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass.Bard
member.summary: Charismatic class combining magic, music, and social skills.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass.Paladin
member.summary: Holy warrior class combining combat prowess with divine magic.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterClass.Ranger
member.summary: Wilderness expert class skilled in ranged combat and nature magic.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace
member.summary: Fantasy races available for character creation.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace.Human
member.summary: Versatile human race with balanced abilities and adaptability.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace.Elf
member.summary: Graceful elf race with bonuses to dexterity and intelligence.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace.Dwarf
member.summary: Sturdy dwarf race with bonuses to constitution and strength.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace.Gnome
member.summary: Clever gnome race with bonuses to intelligence and wisdom.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace.Halfling
member.summary: Lucky halfling race with bonuses to dexterity and luck.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.CharacterRace.HalfElf
member.summary: Mixed heritage half-elf race combining human and elven traits.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.ObjectType
member.summary: Types of interactive objects in ASCII dungeons.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.ObjectType.Door
member.summary: A door that can be opened or locked.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.ObjectType.Monster
member.summary: A hostile creature that attacks the player.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.ObjectType.Chest
member.summary: A container that may hold items or treasure.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.TileType
member.summary: Types of tiles in the 2D tile dungeon.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.TileType.Wall
member.summary: Impassable wall tile.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.TileType.Floor
member.summary: Walkable floor tile.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.TileType.Door
member.summary: Door tile that can be opened.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.TileType.Key
member.summary: Key item tile.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.TileType.Treasure
member.summary: Treasure chest tile.

member.name: F:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.TileType.Exit
member.summary: Exit tile that completes the dungeon.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.NarrativeTerminal
member.summary: Presents the opening narrative terminal with a flexible prompt/choice system that content teams can extend via JSON. FUTURE: Will integrate with DreamweaverSystem for LLM-powered dynamic narrative (see ADR-0003). Integration points marked with // FUTURE: LLM_INTEGRATION comments.

member.name: T:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData
member.summary: Classic CRPG party creation and management system.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.Members
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of party members.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.Gold
member.summary: Gets or sets the party's gold amount.

member.name: P:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.Inventory
member.summary: Gets or sets the party's inventory as a dictionary of item names to quantities.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: Default constructor that creates an empty party with no members, zero gold, and empty inventory.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.AddMember(OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.Character)
member.summary: Adds a character to the party if there is space (maximum 3 members).
member.returns: if character was added, if party is full.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.RemoveMember(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a character from the party by index.
member.returns: if character was removed, if index is invalid.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.GetMember(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a character by index.
member.returns: Character if index is valid, otherwise.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.IsComplete
member.summary: Checks if the party is complete (has 3 members).
member.returns: if the party has 3 members, otherwise.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.GetTotalLevel
member.summary: Gets the total level of all party members.
member.returns: The sum of all party member levels.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.GetAverageLevel
member.summary: Calculates the average party level.
member.returns: The average level of all party members, or 0 if party is empty.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.AddGold(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds gold to the party's treasury.
member.param: Amount of gold to add. Must be positive.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.RemoveGold(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes gold from the party's treasury.
member.returns: if gold was removed, if insufficient funds.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.AddItem(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds an item to the party inventory.
member.param: Quantity to add (default 1). Must be positive.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.RemoveItem(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes an item from the party inventory.
member.returns: if item was removed, if insufficient quantity.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.GetItemQuantity(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the quantity of a specific item in the inventory.
member.returns: Quantity of the item, or 0 if not found.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.ToDictionary
member.summary: Converts party data to a Godot dictionary for serialization.
member.returns: A dictionary containing members, gold, and inventory data.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Source.Scripts.PartyData.FromDictionary(Godot.Collections.Dictionary{System.String,Godot.Variant})
member.summary: Creates party data from a Godot dictionary.
member.param: The dictionary containing serialized party data.
member.returns: A new instance populated from the dictionary.

member.name: M:OmegaSpiral.Tests.NarrativeTerminalSchemaTests.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes of the resources used by this test class.
member.param: True if called from Dispose, false if called from finalizer.

member.name: T:GameState
member.summary: Global game state singleton managing player progress, Dreamweaver alignment, and persistence. FUTURE: Will track LLM consultation history and dynamic narrative state (see ADR-0003).

member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the current scene in the game.

member.summary: Gets or sets the player's chosen Dreamweaver narrative thread.

member.name: P:GameState.PlayerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the player's chosen name.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of story shards collected by the player.

member.name: M:NarratorEngine.AddDialogue(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a single dialogue line to the queue.

member.name: M:NarratorEngine.AddDialogueRange(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Adds multiple dialogue lines to the queue.
member.param: The list of dialogue texts to add.

member.name: M:NarratorEngine.GetNextDialogue
member.summary: Gets the next dialogue from the queue, or if empty.
member.returns: The next dialogue string, or if queue is empty.

member.name: M:NarratorEngine.ClearDialogueQueue
member.summary: Clears all dialogue from the queue.

member.name: M:NarratorEngine.HasDialogue
member.summary: Checks if there is any dialogue in the queue.
member.returns: if dialogue is available, otherwise.

member.name: M:NarratorEngine.ProcessDialogueQueue(System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Processes the next dialogue in the queue using the provided output action.
member.param: The action to perform with the dialogue text.

member.name: M:NarratorEngine.BreakTextIntoChunks(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Simulates the typewriter effect by breaking text into smaller chunks.
member.param: The text to break into chunks.
The maximum size of each chunk (default 10).
member.returns: A list of text chunks.

member.name: M:NarratorEngine.ProcessNarrativeBlock(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Processes narrative blocks and adds them to the dialogue queue.
member.param: The list of paragraphs to process.
Optional action to output each chunk immediately.
